entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 12:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 11.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
